1.content: Generate sample portfolio images for photographer website
1.details: Create high-quality placeholder images for different categories: weddings, portraits, nature photography to populate the portfolio gallery

2.content: Build the photographer portfolio website (Static Version)
2.details:
Develop a complete static portfolio website with HTML/CSS/JavaScript:
- Home page with hero image and call-to-action
- About section with photographer bio
- Portfolio gallery with lightbox and category filters (Weddings, Portraits, Nature)
- Services/Pricing section with package cards
- Testimonials section with customer reviews
- Contact form and location map
- Responsive design for all devices
- Professional styling with modern UI/UX

3.details:
Test all interactive features including:
- Gallery lightbox and filtering
- Contact form submission
- Responsive behavior across devices
- Deploy to web hosting for public access
